title: Hey guys want to share a tidbit of insight, though feel free to dismiss it
body:
http://imgur.com/Bl7vxPS


I used to be such an asshole lol

replies.body: It depends on all of those things...

That is surprising since a family in Nepal living day to day through hard work and knitting cashmere jumpers can be more gracious and happy then a jumped up millionaire who thinks that they will never have enough
